headline: From Coffee Grounds to Comfy Soles: The Science Behind Sunnystep’s Sustainable Shoes
description: Yes, you read that rightyour next step could be powered by yesterdays coffee! At Sunnystep, were passionate about reducing waste, so weve partnered with the world's best material scientists to transform used coffee grounds into the fabric for the uppers of our Dream Sneakers, Dream Oxford, and Dream Mules. headline: The Science of Comfort: Sunnystep x MIT Sports Lab Collaboration
description: At Sunnystep, we believe that comfort is an art and a science. To push the boundaries of what a shoe can do, we knew we needed to think beyond traditional design.
